projects.projectPlan: Systematically resolve all build, lint, and test errors to get the project into a runnable state.

tasks.title: Fix Architectural Errors (Deno & VSCode)
tasks.description: Refactor all code that uses Deno or VSCode APIs to use Node.js equivalents. This is the highest priority as it is the root cause of many build failures.

tasks.title: Fix Module Resolution Errors
tasks.description: Correct all import paths across the codebase. Remove `.ts` extensions from imports and fix any broken relative paths.

tasks.title: Fix Type-Checking Errors
tasks.description: Resolve all remaining TypeScript errors (e.g., 'is of type unknown', 'property does not exist') after the major architectural and module issues are fixed.
